column5: The Haven is a cozy apartment with it's own courtyard. It has a full kitchen, with everything needed to enjoy meals at home. The living area has seating for four. The bathroom has a jetted tub and a full size washer and dryer. Well behaved pets are welcome. There's lot do do here, and we are 40 minutes from the Worlds Largest Casino, 20 minutes from Texas Motor Speedway, and about 45 minutes from Dallas or Fort Worth. Texas Woman's University and University of North Texas are very near.
